participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Cynical yet introspective, often reflecting on life's challenges and personal losses.
participant_1.background: i don't believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working. i work at a nursing home. my wife left me and took my children.

participant_2.background: i buy only organic food products. i love social media especially twitter. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i am a feminist.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
